pr_title: Add sound to custom projectile impact

timeline.message:
Play sound effect for custom projectiles

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: I am not convinced that this is an optional sound. Vanilla minecraft does the ding no matter your sound setting, and this also should
timeline.author: Pablete1234

replies.bodyText: I would agree, let's keep it default.
replies.author: Electroid

replies.bodyText: @Pablete1234 and @Electroid thanks for clarifying this. I was unsure about whether to make it default or not and I agree, it’s been adjusted!
replies.author: applenick

timeline.message:
Always play projectile impact sound
